title: Diamond Flower Tikkabindi Pendant - Modern Maang Tikka Accent
features: This exquisite pendant features three interconnected floral motifs, each meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The central floral design is framed by two leaf designs, adding a touch of natural elegance. Each petal and leaf are pavé set, maximizing the diamond's brilliance. The bottom of the pendant displays a series of dangling diamond clusters, adding movement and sparkle. It's designed as a modern tikkabindi to be added as an accent to a Maang Tikka. The gold is polished to a high shine for a classic look.
colors: with the dazzling brilliance of the diamonds creating a vibrant
occasions: Perfect as an accent to a Maang Tikka for weddings (muhurtham)
or any special occasion where a touch of sophisticated sparkle is desired. Also suitable for upscale parties and celebrations.
description: This diamond pendant offers a unique blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance. The high-quality diamonds provide exceptional sparkle, while the durable 18K gold ensures lasting beauty. It makes a statement piece.
